Source code for maxaimetadata.test_maxflow

import sys
import os

sys.path.append("/home/jovyan/max.ai.ds.core/")
import pytest
from unittest.mock import patch, MagicMock

from maxaimetadata.maxflow import MaxFlow



[docs]def test_maxflow():

    mf = MaxFlow()
    
    mf.set_experiment('wrapper_test_exp', 'wrapper_test_proj', '/home/jovyan/max.ai.ds.core')

    run = mf.start_run('test_run', 'test run for  mlflow wrapper class')
  
    mf_active = MaxFlow.get_active_flow()
    
    assert(mf == mf_active)
    
    d = {'a':'b'}
    run.log_dict(d, 'test')
    
    
    import os
    filename = "foo/bar.txt"
    os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(filename), exist_ok=True)
    with open(filename, "w") as f:
        f.write("FOOBAR")
    run.log_artifact("foo/bar.txt")
    
    run.log_artifacts("foo")
    
    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    fig, axs = plt.subplots(2)
    x0, y0 = [1,2,3], [1,2,3]
    x1, y1 = [1,2,3], [1,2,3]
    axs[0].plot(x0, y0)
    axs[1].plot(x1, y1)
    run.log_figure(fig, 'my_plot.png')
    
    run.log_metric('a', 1)
    
    run.log_metrics({'a':1, 'b':2})
    
    run.log_param('a', 1)
    
    run.log_params({'a':1, 'b':2})
    
    run.set_tag('a', 1)
    
    run.set_tags({'a':'1', 'b':'2'})
    
    run.log_data('feature_view')
    
    child_run = run.start_child_run()
    
    child_run.end_run()
    
    run.end_run()
    
    assert(True)
